data.name: My University Girlfriend
data.detailed_description:
This is a relaxing and casual puzzle game that can train your memory and observation skills.

Game introduction

The Angel Academy is a magical academy where humans and elves coexist harmoniously. The after-school life of the academy is always so colorful, whether it is a gentle and lovely elven girl, an athletic girl full of youth and vitality, or a noble student council president... …Here, what kind of beautiful encounter is waiting for you?

Game Features

❤ Twelve unique girls
❤ One-handed mode
❤ Picture gallery is perfectly archived by default

data.short_description: This is a relaxing and casual puzzle game that can train your memory and observation skills. The after-school life in Angel Academy is always so colorful, and the graceful and colorful figures in the club are full of youth and vitality. Here, what kind of beautiful encounter will be waiting for you?
data.supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Hungarian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x86/x64
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual core
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content

-All characters in the game are over 18 years old
